shortdesc.ph: Callback when the user role switch fails.
Occurs when the user role switch fails.
Callback when user role change fails.
Callback when the user role switch fails.

p.codeblock: final void Function( RtcConnection connection, ClientRoleChangeFailedReason reason, ClientRoleType currentRole)? onClientRoleChangeFailed;
public virtual void OnClientRoleChangeFailed(RtcConnection connection, CLIENT_ROLE_CHANGE_FAILED_REASON reason, CLIENT_ROLE_TYPE currentRole) { }

section.p: When the user role switch fails, you can use this callback to learn the reason for the failure and the current user role.
When the user role switch fails, you can use this callback to learn the reason for the failure and the current user role.
When the user role change fails, you can use this callback to get the reason for the failure and the current user role.
This callback informs you of the reason for the failure and the current user role when the user role switch fails.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: After the local user joins the channel, if fails to set the user role, the SDK triggers this callback.
This callback is triggered when the local user fails to switch roles by calling after joining a channel.
This callback is triggered when the local user fails to set the user role using after joining the channel.
This callback is triggered when the SDK fails to set the user role after the local user joins a channel and calls or .
